summary: QuizSection.tsx was updated to use a teddy-bear sticker image path in the results view, but the required new static asset file is not shown as added, and the diff snippet does not conclusively show the question-card sticker update. Some meta/state documentation files were also modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new teddy-bear-style cartoony sticker image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with a sanitized filename, loadable via `/assets/generated/<filename>`.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff summary ("Added: 0"), and there is no evidence of a new PNG being created under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx` to replace the corner-sticker `` `src` with the new teddy-bear sticker asset path in BOTH the quiz question card view and the quiz results card view (same path), preserving placement/sizing/rotation and not blocking UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided `QuizSection.tsx` snippet shows the updated sticker `src` in the results card view, but the question card portion is truncated, so the diff summary does not provide direct evidence that the question-card sticker `` was also updated to the same new path.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive metadata claiming quiz uses the teddy-bear sticker on both question and results cards.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked to swap the sticker image and add the asset; it did not ask to modify repository summary/metadata files.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified): includes narrative stating sticker is on both question and results cards using `/assets/generated/teddy-bear-sticker.dim_220x220.png`
